none: A young stenographer transcribing a note for a well-dressed man, the Hyaft-Fowells School logo.  Gray print.
Pacific Northwest Sheet Music : from the Ashford Collection

Materials in the Pacific Northwest Sheet Music collection are in the public domain.  No copyright permissions are needed.  Acknowledgement of the Pacific Northwest Sheet Music collection as a source for borrowed images is requested.
Our stenographer, with typewriter, does work of high degree
Our stenographer, you've heard of her, we've praised her far and near
Front cover states that this song is: "dedicated to the Hyaft-Fowells School".
